Name: Devastated
About the game: Devastated is a post-apocalyptic action adventure game with role-playing game elements. Level up your character, complete quests and collect & upgrade weapons as you blast your way towards peace and freedom of the wastelanders! A Devastated World In 2042, the World was massively overpopulated and lack of supplies, energy and food caused a global crisis which was ended by Lance Holdeman and his supporters, Nova Concordia. A massive nuclear explosive was detonated which devastated 80% of all life on Earth. Eleven years later, you, a Freedom Alliance supersoldier called 460-E 'Edward', are woken up from hibernation and sent to huge wasteland with only one goal: find and take down Holdeman, the man responsible for the apocalypse and enslavement of the survivors. Game Features Open-World Adventure : Explore the wasteland, meet new friends & enemies and complete quests. Find secret areas and destroy your foes! A Wide Storyline : Seal the fate of the wasteland as you level up your character and fight your way to Nova Concordia. RPG Elements: Level up your character as you progress in the game. Upgrade your weaponry skill to obliterate your enemies, or enhance your agility to dash away - the choice is yours. One-man army : Collect a variety of weapons and upgrade them in order to blast through your enemies. Epic Boss Battles : The wasteland is throwing everything it has got towards you! Ambient Soundtrack : An original soundtrack composed by Woffelson . The world has been devastated. Can you bring it back?
